item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

hereif (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 70000); addItem(1039, 20); sendMessage("The starter packet for KILLARSCAPE players !"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack !"); } }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2007, 08:44:00 PM[/size][hr]chance this into how many cash u want

addItem(995, 70000)
